message.content:
I need to identify the total income (revenue) and its components from the income statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see:
- "Total Revenue" of 5760023.09
- This appears to be made up of only one component: "Main Business Revenue" also with 5760023.09

The task asks me to extract the total income and decompose it into 1 component sub-item. In this case, the total income is the "Total Revenue" line and its only component is "Main Business Revenue".

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5760023.09', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '5760023.09'}}}
```
